## Source: amazon-inspector (07667b579e49b5aa7dcc235c9e846cb1ea838af728878c44548d30a94b136dd3)
The package oxnoxon was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fe833d43cf24d7d5f3bd48f4c09ecee19c4237f49a87600d412abf96b63a6f7f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'oxnoxon' @ 10.0.7 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
